attributes.action: Remove Nicola Sturgeon as first minister of Scotland, no confidence.
attributes.additional_details: She has only one agenda which is independence, it's her purpose of being in power, and this has simply dragged Scotland down and she must be removed from office before she divides Scotland so badly that this will fracture Scotlands society for decades
attributes.background: She is allowing actual elements of governing fall apart causing actual harm. Down grading hospitals especially in far north, education suffering, yet all her focus is on independence and attempting to go against the will of the people by ignoring the first vote.
